dublinCore.dc:title: 113 SRES 18 ATS: Making minority party appointments for the 113th Congress.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. McConnell submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

form.official-title: Making minority party appointments for the 113th Congress.

section.text: That the following be the minority membership on the following committees for the remainder of the 113th Congress, or until their successors are appointed:

header.committee-name: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Cochran, Mr. McConnell, Mr. Roberts, Mr. Chambliss, Mr. Boozman, Mr. Hoeven, Mr. Johanns, Mr. Grassley, and Mr. Thune.
Mr. Shelby, Mr. Cochran, Mr. McConnell, Mr. Alexander, Ms. Collins, Ms. Murkowski, Mr. Graham, Mr. Kirk, Mr. Coats, Mr. Blunt, Mr. Moran, Mr. Hoeven, Mr. Johanns, and Mr. Boozman.
Mr. Inhofe, Mr. McCain, Mr. Sessions, Mr. Chambliss, Mr. Wicker, Ms. Ayotte, Mrs. Fischer, Mr. Graham, Mr. Vitter, Mr. Blunt, Mr. Lee, and Mr. Cruz.

header.committee-name: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Crapo, Mr. Shelby, Mr. Corker, Mr. Vitter, Mr. Johanns, Mr. Toomey, Mr. Kirk, Mr. Moran, Mr. Coburn, and Mr. Heller.
Mr. Sessions, Mr. Grassley, Mr. Enzi, Mr. Crapo, Mr. Graham, Mr. Portman, Mr. Toomey, Mr. Johnson, Ms. Ayotte, and Mr. Wicker.

header.committee-name: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Thune, Mr. Wicker, Mr. Blunt, Mr. Rubio, Ms. Ayotte, Mr. Heller, Mr. Coats, Mr. Scott, Mr. Cruz, Mrs. Fischer, and Mr. Johnson.

header.committee-name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Ms. Murkowski, Mr. Barrasso, Mr. Risch, Mr. Lee, Mr. Heller, Mr. Flake, Mr. Scott, Mr. Alexander, Mr. Portman, and Mr. Hoeven.

header.committee-name: Committee on Environment and Public Works:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Vitter, Mr. Inhofe, Mr. Barrasso, Mr. Sessions, Mr. Crapo, Mr. Wicker, Mr. Boozman, and Mrs. Fischer.
Mr. Hatch, Mr. Grassley, Mr. Crapo, Mr. Roberts, Mr. Enzi, Mr. Cornyn, Mr. Thune, Mr. Burr, Mr. Isakson, Mr. Portman, and Mr. Toomey.
Mr. Corker, Mr. Risch, Mr. Rubio, Mr. Johnson, Mr. Flake, Mr. McCain, Mr. Barrasso, and Mr. Paul.

header.committee-name: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Alexander, Mr. Enzi, Mr. Burr, Mr. Isakson, Mr. Paul, Mr. Hatch, Mr. Roberts, Ms. Murkowski, Mr. Kirk, and Mr. Scott.

header.committee-name: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Coburn, Mr. McCain, Mr. Johnson, Mr. Portman, Mr. Paul, Mr. Enzi, and Ms. Ayotte.
Mr. Grassley, Mr. Hatch, Mr. Sessions, Mr. Graham, Mr. Cornyn, Mr. Lee, Mr. Cruz, and Mr. Flake.
Mr. Roberts, Mr. McConnell, Mr. Cochran, Mr. Chambliss, Mr. Alexander, Mr. Shelby, Mr. Blunt, and Mr. Cruz.

header.committee-name: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Risch, Mr. Vitter, Mr. Rubio, Mr. Paul, Mr. Scott, Mrs. Fischer, Mr. Enzi, and Mr. Johnson.
Mr. Burr, Mr. Isakson, Mr. Johanns, Mr. Moran, Mr. Boozman, and Mr. Heller.
Mr. Barrasso, Mr. McCain, Ms. Murkowski, Mr. Hoeven, Mr. Crapo, and Mrs. Fischer.
Mr. Isakson, Mr. Roberts, and Mr. Risch.
Mr. Chambliss, Mr. Burr, Mr. Risch, Mr. Coats, Mr. Rubio, Ms. Collins, and Mr. Coburn.
Ms. Collins, Mr. Corker, Mr. Hatch, Mr. Kirk, Mr. Heller, Mr. Flake, Ms. Ayotte, Mr. Scott, and Mr. Cruz.
Mr. Coats, Mr. Lee, Mr. Wicker, and Mr. Toomey.
